review: Works great. Save some $ not buying a smart TV and just attaching one of these. Only negatives: slow start-up and it requires a USB port to power. I would buy again!
author: Chris

review: Caused the picture in my tv to go out. Ended up having to get a new tv and got a smart tv, didn't need the fire stick thankfully
author: Amazon Customer

review: Great device, easy to set up and easy to use!
author: NLL16

review: Easy to install and use. Lots of good movies and TV shows available.  The menu could be improved a little and the search function is VERY limited.  The search engine basically looks on Amazon only.
author: Frank

review: I really enjoy this product. I've only had it for about a week, but found no bugs in the setup and it fires up (no pun intended) extra quick. Very nice interface too.
author: Cayden Countryman

review: I like the firestick but without anything to guide me as to what can I do using it besides just wTching a movie it's disappointing not to know things like , can I tape a movie for later use, or ???? Other things.I thought a description booklet would come with it besides how to load it.
author: Donna L. White

review: Very easy to use. Love it!!!!!!
author: Tammy S.
